meanings.sent1: I will retrain my dog to do tricks.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to retrain their employees on the new software.
meanings.sent3: She tried to retrain her cat to use the litter box, but it was a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The coach had to retrain the team's strategy after a tough loss.
meanings.sent5: It's important to retrain your muscles when starting a new exercise routine.

meanings.sent1: I need to retrain myself in coding to get a better job.
meanings.sent2: She decided to retrain in graphic design to pursue her passion.
meanings.sent3: He tried to retrain in cooking, but he kept burning everything.
meanings.sent4: After the accident, he had to retrain his brain to regain his memory.
meanings.sent5: It's never too late to retrain and learn something new.
